reviewText: Paula is an American Icon and National Treasure.  It's sad that the media has portrayed her as this villain but the truth is she has overcome so many obstacles in her career that it is really remarkable the success she has had.  I could watch her all day!  Love you Paula! #TeamPaula
My wife hasn't been very happy with this.  Not enough detail into the recipes as the host has the exception you know what your doing ;)
Worth the cost to me. I am giving this as a present to a learning young cook who I feel will appreciate this. I like Paula Deen's cooking shows myself.
Paula knows her subject matter that's for sure.  She makes it look simple to make these wonderful things.  They come out looking great and delicious.

I love this video set.  This is Paula when she was beginning in TV, and it is so good.  She is a wonderful host and I have learned so much from watching her.  Thank you, thank you, thank you, Amazon for having Paula Deen "Sure to Please".  Just wonderful!

I bought this DVD for my sister who loves Paula D, and when she cooks dishes inspired by Paula's recipes; she invites me over to enjoy wonderful delicious food. Along with Amazon provide ding the easiest, least expensive and convenient place to buy this DVD. Thank you Paula and Amazon...D

I bought this as a present for my mother who just loves the show, but I'll admit, I'm a big fan as well. I love watching the show on DVD because well, obviously the lack of commercials, and the funny little extras. Paula is hilarious and the recipes on in this particular set are just delicious! Definitely recommended to anyone who loves southern cookin' or tasty foods that reminds you of being home.
